The Oxyfresh Pet Toothbrush is a popular choice among dog owners, and for good reason. The ultra-soft bristles are designed to be gentle on your dog's gums, making it an excellent option for dogs with sensitive mouths.

Remember to introduce the new toothbrush gradually, starting with short sessions and gradually increasing the duration as Max becomes more comfortable with the process. It's also essential to use a gentle touch and to reward Max with treats and praise for good behavior.

In addition to the toothbrush, don't forget to choose a dog toothpaste that's suitable for Max's needs. Oxyfresh also offers a range of dog toothpastes that are non-toxic, gentle, and effective. You can consider their Enzymatic Toothpaste or their Sensitive Teeth Toothpaste, depending on Max's specific needs.

Some other tips to keep in mind:

* Brush Max's teeth at the same time every day, so it becomes a part of his routine.
* Be patient and go at Max's pace. If he's not comfortable with the toothbrush, take a break and try again later.
* Make sure to brush all surfaces of Max's teeth, including the front, back, and top.
* Don't forget to praise and reward Max for good behavior, even if it's just for a few seconds of brushing.

By following these tips and using the Oxyfresh Pet Toothbrush, you'll be well on your way to keeping Max's teeth clean and healthy.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask!
